text: From First to Last (formerly named First Too Last) is an American post- hardcore band from Los Angeles, originally from Georgia and Florida. == History == The band formed in 1999 under the name First too Last. In 2004, 15-year-old Sonny Moore joined the band. The first album, Dear Diary, My Teen Angst Has a Bodycount, was released on June 29, 2004. Heroine, the band's second album, was recorded in 2005 with Limp Bizkit guitarist Was Borland on the bass. Heroine was released on March 21, 2006. Moore left the band in early 2007 and guitarist Matt Good took over the lead vocals. In 2008, the band released their third album, named From First to Last, with Interscope Records. Guitarist–screamer Travis Richter left the band in 2009, becoming lead vocalist in the metalcore band The Human Abstract in 2010. In March 16, 2010, the band released their fourth album, Throne to the Wolves, with guitarist Blake Steiner and label Rise. The band was disbanded on July 29, 2010, but was brought back together in November 2013, with Sonny Moore returning == Discography == ; Albums/EPs * Aesthetic (EP, 2003) - Four Leaf Records * Dear Diary, My Teen Angst Has a Body Count (2004) - Epitaph Records * Heroine (2006) - Epitaph Records * From First to Last (2008) - Interscope Records * Throne to the Wolves (2010) - Rise Records == Videography == * Such a Tragedy (2003) * Ride the Wings of Pestilence (2004) * Note to Self (2005) * The Latest Plague (2006) * Shame Shame (2006) * Worlds Away (2008) == Members == ; Current members * Matt Good - Lead vocals/screams (since 2007), lead guitar, keyboards (since 1999) * Blake Steiner - Rhythm guitar, backing vocals (since 2009) * Matt Manning - Screamed vocals, bass (since 2007) * Derek Bloom - Drums (since 2002) ; Former members * Sonny Moore - Lead vocals, keyboards, rhythm guitar (2004-2007) * Phillip Reardon - Lead vocals/screams, keyboards (2002-2003) * Travis Richter - Screamed vocals, rhythm guitar (since 2002), lead vocals (2002) * Scott Oord - Bass, backing vocals (1999-2002) * Joey Antillion - Bass (2002-2003) * Jon Weisberg - Screamed vocals, bass (2004-2005) * Parker Nelms - Drums (1999-2000) * Steve Pullman - Drums, keyboard (2000-2002) * Greg Taylor - Drums (2002) * Chris Lent - Synthesizers, percussion (2008) ; Touring members * Rick Patterson – Rhythm guitar (2003–2004) * Alicia Simmons - Bass (2005) * Wes Borland – Bass (2005–2006) * Matt Fleischman – Bass (2006-2007) ==References== == Other websites == * FFTL Official Websites * MySpace Site * PureVolume Site * Facebook Site Category:American punk bands Category:Emo bands Category:Post-hardcore bands Category:Musicians from Tampa, Florida Category:Musical groups from Florida
title: From First to Last
